installer:
  anaconda:
    disabled_modules:
    - org.fedoraproject.Anaconda.Modules.Subscription
    enabled_modules:
    - org.fedoraproject.Anaconda.Modules.Network
    kickstart: '# some kickstart data'
    sudo_nopasswd:
    - lzap
    - '%devops'
    unattended: true
  coreos:
    installation_device: /dev/vda
name: 'Blueprint example: installer'
storage:
  partitions: null
  type: gpt
